markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Healing Hands](/Feats.aspx?ID=4646) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[healing font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

Your vitality is even more vibrant and restorative. When you cast [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554), you roll d10s instead of d8s.

<title level="2">Healing Hands leads to...</title>
[Magic Hands](/Feats.aspx?ID=4664)
name: Healing Hands
